name: Enter, Stage Right
description:
Enter, Stage Right is a short game about anxiety.

It is a game without words.

It was made in five days.

From the creator of Three Fourths Home, among other, lesser-played things.

Playable with keyboard or gamepad.

Note: E,SR's gamepad controls are based on a 360 controller. If you're using a different gamepad, there will probably be some "translation" involved.

for more games, feel free to visit bracket-games.com

and/or
